sentences.en: Carbon fiber interior trim or exquisite woods complete the exclusive ambience.
sentences.cn: 碳素纤维饰材及名贵木材装饰为整个车辆更添高贵色彩.

sentences.en: Complementary colours produce a quieter, more relaxing ambience than contrasting colours.
sentences.cn: 补充颜色产生噪音, 更轻松的氛围比色彩对比度.

sentences.en: Improve the ambience and dine by candlelight saving electricity.
sentences.cn: 营造氛围,借烛光进晚餐,节约用电.

sentences.en: Improve the ambience and have dinner by candlelight, saving the electricity.
sentences.cn: 烛光晚餐有氛围, 节约用电何乐而不为?

sentences.en: Literature often reacts magnificently to an ambience of unease or apparent breakdown.
sentences.cn: 文学常常在不安或表面崩溃的气氛中才能做出最出色的反应.

sentences.en: The ambience also delighted King, and they talked amicably through nine courses and three hours.
sentences.cn: 幽雅的环境也使“国王”心旷神怡.在总共九道菜,长达三个小时的晚餐过程中, 他们一直友好地交谈着.

sentences.en: The invaders have destroyed the, oh, I don't know what the right word is—the atmosphere, the ambience.
sentences.cn: 入侵者破坏了，嗯，我不知道用什么字眼好——气氛，氛围。

sentences.en: The little restaurant has a pleasant ambience.
The manager tries to create a pleasant ambience in the office.
sentences.cn: 经理努力在办公室营造一种愉快的氛围.

sentences.en: The overall ambience of the room is cosy.
sentences.cn: 房间整体的感觉是温暖舒适。

sentences.en: The rejuvenating ambience of autumn is immeasurably more ancient than even the calendar.
sentences.cn: 秋天那让人恢复青春活力的气氛远比历法还要古老.

sentences.en: the relaxed ambience of the city
The statue has a gentleness, an ambience, a wistful elegance.
sentences.cn: 那尊雕像具有一种柔和 、 一种独特格调 、 一种忧郁沉思的雅致.

sentences.en: This restaurant has a pleasant ambience.
sentences.cn: 这家饭店的环境优雅宜人.

sentences.en: We've tried to create the ambience of a French bistro.
sentences.cn: 我们想尽量创造出法国小餐馆的气氛.

trans.tran_cn: 气氛，布景，周围环境，“ambiance”的变体
trans.tran_en: the qualities and character of a particular place and the way these make you feel
